messages.subject: Re: going beyond judgment/punishment (was "are you a good mom or a b
messages.msgSnippet: I m really enjoying those random quotes generators and random links doo-dads! Sandra Me too - I take the attitude that what they give me is what I most need,
messages.messageBody:
I'm really enjoying those random quotes generators and random links

doo-dads!



Sandra


Me too - I take the attitude that what they give me is what I most need, in that moment.  Very often, there is an immediate connection made!

Peace!
shan

"There is a microscopically thin line between being brilliantly creative and acting like the most gigantic idiot on earth. So what the hell, leap." - Cynthia Heimel

messages.subject: Re: going beyond judgment/punishment (was "are you a good mom or a b
messages.msgSnippet: People like rules and touchstones and proofs and flags to wave. I think the rule should be think, and the touchstone should be a child s head, touched
messages.messageBody:
People like rules and touchstones and proofs and flags to wave.



I think "the rule" should be "think," and the touchstone should be a

child's head, touched gently.

Oh, Sandra....this is lovely!  Powerful and moving....please put it on the quotes page!

It gave me actual goosebumps....
Shan

"There is a microscopically thin line between being brilliantly creative and acting like the most gigantic idiot on earth. So what the hell, leap." - Cynthia Heimel
